description: Comprehensive IT security services including threat protection, vulnerability assessment, and advanced security monitoring for businesses across Canada.

itemOffered.name: Vulnerability Assessment
itemOffered.description: Comprehensive scanning and assessment of network and system vulnerabilities with detailed remediation advice.

itemOffered.name: Managed Security Services
itemOffered.description: 24/7 monitoring and management of security devices and systems.

itemOffered.name: Incident Response
itemOffered.description: Rapid response to security incidents with containment, eradication, and recovery services.

itemOffered.name: Security Compliance
itemOffered.description: Assistance with industry regulations and security compliance requirements.
